title: "panic: execution timeout at bigInt:1" happens since I raised version to 1.11.5
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `v1.11.5`
CL client & version: prysmaticlabs/prysm@v4.0.1
OS & Version: Linux(AmazonLinux)
vCPU: 8
RAM: 32GB
storage:
  type: gp3
  size: 2000 GiB
  IOPS: 3000
  throughput: 125

#### Expected behaviour
no panic

#### Actual behaviour
geth got panic

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I have encountered the following PANIC at least twice since I raised it to 1.11.5 on 4/10 and geth stopped.
- running option added this time
```
--db.engine pebble
```

#### Backtrace

````
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic: execution timeout at bigInt:1:23925(46) [recovered]
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic: execution timeout at bigInt:1:23925(46) [recovered]
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic: execution timeout at bigInt:1:23925(46) [recovered]
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic: execution timeout at bigInt:1:23925(46)
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: goroutine 2132519 [running]:
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: encoding/json.(*encodeState).marshal.func1()
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: encoding/json/encode.go:326 +0x6e
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic({0x1817080, 0xc0a9407700})
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: runtime/panic.go:884 +0x213
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*vm).handleThrow(0xc095f18d80, {0x1817080, 0xc0a9407700})
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:730 +0x3b8
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*vm).try.func1()
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:749 +0x45
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic({0x1817080, 0xc0a9407700})
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: runtime/panic.go:884 +0x213
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*vm).handleThrow(0xc095f18d80, {0x1817080, 0xc0a9407700})
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:730 +0x3b8
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*vm).runTryInner.func1()
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:772 +0x45
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: panic({0x1817080, 0xc0a9407700})

Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*vm).run(0xc095f18d80)
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:577 +0x133
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*vm).runTryInner(0xc095f18d80?)
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:776 +0x70
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*baseJsFuncObject).__call(0xc02e059d40, {0xc00a2e8800?, 0x1, 0xc00a2e87f0?}, {0x0?, 0x0}, {0x1cb46c8?, 0xc056e43470?})

Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/func.go:402 +0x7a

Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/builtin_json.go:366 +0x91b
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*_builtinJSON_stringifyContext).do(0xc01b859810, {0x1cb46c8, 0xc0c5ab7620})
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/builtin_json.go:274 +0x28e
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*Object).MarshalJSON.func1()

Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/vm.go:753 +0x242
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja.(*Object).MarshalJSON(0x19171e0?)
Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: github.com/dop251/goja@v0.0.0-20230122112309-96b1610dd4f7/value.go:927 +0x97

Apr  9 17:52:25 geth: encoding/json/encode.go:358 +0x78

Apr  9 17:52:26 systemd: geth.service: main process exited, code=exited, status=2/INVALIDARGUMENT
````

Look guys are on drug's or something  panic not at all your should I would
appreciate if you would take your fake story lines and web creativeness and
try and see if you can  trick The Light before it get here oh oops you
really don't know do you?
